snippet: The reality of Intel's presentation of its new Xeon E5 processor is that processing, long Intel's strong suit, is now just one more feature alongside technology to enable twice the bandwidth throughput, enhanced security and energy management. Intel...
abstract: The reality of Intel's presentation of its new Xeon E5 processor is that processing, long Intel's strong suit, is now just one more feature alongside technology to enable twice the bandwidth throughput, enhanced security and energy management. Intel said the E5 offers better capability in all these, and can also be used as a chip in servers, data storage, and networking.

headline.main: Intel's New Chip: A Best Defense in the Cloud
headline.print_headline: In New Landscape, A New Intel Chip
